item.title: Alchemy Gloves
item.fluff: When you use an alchemical item, these gloves charge it with magical power

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls with alchemical items.

item.title: Blackleaf Gloves
item.fluff: Made from the leaves of an ancient Feywild oak, these well-preserved black gloves increase the utility of your pact boon

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYour Pact Boon triggers
EffectYou teleport 2 squares.
Level 14Teleport 3 squares.
Level 24Teleport 4 squares.

If you have the misty step Pact Boon power, you instead either increase the maximum distance of that teleportation, or teleport an ally that was adjacent to the creature that triggered your Pact Boon.

item.title: Breaching Strikes Gauntlets
item.fluff: These thick leather gauntlets allow your attacks to bypass even the best resistances

block.name: Property
block.line: Your Weapon attacks ignore 1 point of resistance the target has, if any.
Level 162 points of resistance.
Level 265 points of resistance.

item.title: Burglar's Gloves
item.fluff: These fingerless black gloves are embroidered with dark red sigils, and improve your thievery skills

item.title: Burning Gauntlets
item.fluff: Made of iron and constantly trailing wisps of smoke, these plated gloves incite your inner pyromaniac

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou make an attack with the Fire keyword

EffectUntil the end of the encounter, your Fire attacks deal +2 additional damage. If you have finished at least one encounter without expending your action point, this increases to +3 additional damage.
Level 16+4 additional damage or +6 additional damage, respectively.
Level 26+6 additional damage or +9 additional damage, respecitively.
The first target you hit with the triggering attack also takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Level 16Ongoing 10 fire damage.
Level 26Ongoing 15 fire damage.

item.title: Cat Paws
item.fluff: Furry on the outside, silky on the inside, these gloves sprout claws that make climbing easier

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks to climb.
Level 15+6 item bonus.
Level 25+10 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your next turn, you do not spend an extra square of movement for each square you climb.
Level 15You gain a +2 item bonus to any climb speed you gain from powers you use, or to your ground speed if a power specifically tells you to climb as part of movement.

Level 25Until the end of the encounter, and you gain +4 item bonus to any climb speed you gain from powers you use, or to your ground speed if a power specifically tells you to climb as part of movement.

item.title: Caustic Gauntlets
item.fluff: These rough leather coverings drip with acid as you attack

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a ranged attack

EffectUntil the end of the encounter, your ranged attacks deal +2 additional acid damage. If you have finished at least one encounter without expending your action point, this increases to +3 additional acid damage.
Level 16+4 additional acid damage or +6 additional acid damage, respectively.
Level 26+6 additional acid damage or +9 additional acid damage, respecitively.
Any untyped damage dealt by the triggering attack is acid damage instead, and the attack gains the Acid keyword.
If the triggering attack already has a damage type, the type is changed to acid and the corresponding keyword is replaced with Acid.
After you hit or miss a target of the triggering attack, each creature adjacent to that target takes 1d8 acid damage.
Level 162d8 acid damage.
Level 263d8 acid damage.

item.title: Claw Gloves
item.fluff: These gloves incorporate the claws of a panther, granting you additional power in your beast form

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are in beast form and make a melee attack against an enemy granting combat advantage to you, you deal an extra +1d4 damage against that enemy.
Level 14Extra +2d4 damage.
Level 24Extra +3d4 damage.

item.title: Climbing Claws
item.fluff: Sharp claws magically unfold from these padded leather gloves

block.name: Property
block.line: These gloves count as simple one-handed Light Blades with a +3 proficiency bonus that deal 1d4 damage, and have the Free Hand and Off-Hand weapon traits.

You have proficiency with these weapons, and can have the weapon in either or both hands, and they count as having the magic weapon enchantment. If you want to give the weapons a different enchantment, the level of this item increases by the difference in level for the enchantments. For example, to make this item into +1 vicious climbing claws, the level would increase by one.

item.title: Dual-Threat Gauntlets
item.fluff: When you and an ally fight together, the power of these gauntlets heightens both your attacks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of the encounter, while you're flanking an enemy, you and the ally flanking with you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the flanked enemy.

item.title: Feinting Gloves
item.fluff: These black silk gloves help you misdirect your opponent's attention.

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 bonus to Bluff checks to feint.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain combat advantage until the end of your current turn against the first target you attack before the end of your current turn.

item.title: Flaying Gloves
item.fluff: These tight-fitting gloves allow you to deal bleeding wounds with a light blade

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using a Light blade
EffectThe triggering enemy takes ongoing 2 damage (save ends). If the triggering attack already deals ongoing damage, increase that damage by this value instead.
Level 14Ongoing 4 damage.
Level 24Ongoing 6 damage.

item.title: Forgemaster's Gloves
item.fluff: These blacksmith's gloves are studden with enchanted gems and emblazoned with a hammer and anvil

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 fire.
Level 16Resist 10 fire.
Level 26Resist 15 fire.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectThe first time you hit with an attack before the end of the encounter, the target takes 1d6 extra fire damage.
Level 162d6 extra fire damage.
Level 263d6 extra fire damage.

item.title: Frost Gauntlets
item.fluff: When you pick up your weapon, the ice crystal patterns ethced into these gauntlets flare, cauting the weapon in a thin sheet of frost

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a melee attack

EffectUntil the end of the encounter, your melee attacks deal +2 additional cold damage. If you have finished at least one encounter without expending your action point, this increases to +3 additional damage.
Level 17+4 additional cold damage or +6 additional cold damage, respectively.
Level 27+6 additional cold damage or +9 additional cold damage, respectively.
Any untyped damage dealt by the triggering attack is cold damage instead, and the attack gainst the Cold keyword.
If the triggering attack already has a damage type, the type is changed to cold and the corresponding keyword is replaced by Cold.
The first target you hit with the triggering attack is also slowed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Gauntlets of Arcane Might
item.fluff: When a foe you have challenged reels from your arcane power, these gauntlets grant you increases vigor

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use an arcane attack power and hit an enemy marked by you, you gain 2 temporary hit points. These temporary hit points last until the end of the encounter.
Level 135 temporary hit points
Level 238 temporary hit points

item.title: Gauntlets of Blood
item.fluff: The blood of wounded foes streams along the joints of these rusty-looking gauntlets

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +3 item bonus to damage rolls against bloodied targets.
Level 14+5 item bonus.
Level 24+8 item bonus.

item.title: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
item.fluff: These oversized armored gloves increase your strength and can be actived to increase damage

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks and Strength ability checks, but not Strength attacks.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a +2 power bonus to melee damage rolls until the end of the encounter. This also applies to ranged damage rolls for Heavy Thrown weapons.

item.title: Gauntlets of Ogre Power, Greater
item.fluff: When the brutal strength of the ogre courses through you, nothing can stand in your way

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +4 item bonus to Athletics checks and Strength checks.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a Strength check to break an object or lift an object
EffectYou gain a +4 power bonus to the triggering Strength check.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a +4 power bonus to melee damage rolls until the end of the encounter. This also applies to ranged damage rolls for Heavy Thrown weapons.

item.title: Giantkind Gloves
item.fluff: The leather of these gloves was harvested from beasts of giant size

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectYou pick up an unattended object that weighs 30 lb. or less, then make the following ranged Weapon attack using the object as the weapon:
AttackRanged 6/12 (one creature); Strength +2 vs. AC
Level 14Ranged 8/16; Strength +4
Level 24Ranged 10/20; Strength +6
Hit2d6 + Strength modifier damage.
Level 142d8 + Strength modifier damage.
Level 243d8 + Strength modifier damage.
Your DM might determine that an item is so fragile or light that it deals half damage instead.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit with a melee attack, or the at-will attack power of these gloves
EffectYou gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls with the triggering attack.
Level 14+4 power bonus.
Level 24+6 power bonus.

item.title: Gloves of Piercing
item.fluff: These enchanted gloves can be activated to ignore an opponent's resistances for a short time

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectRanged sight (one creature); Until the end of the encounter, you ignore any resistance of 10 or lower that the target has.
Level 13resistance 15 or lower
Level 23resistance 20 or lower

item.title: Gloves of Saving Grace
item.fluff: While wearing these gloves, you can help a companion recover with but a touch

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one ally); The target can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.

item.title: Gorilla Gloves
item.fluff: You possess the might to hois opponents above your head and hurl them out of your way

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackMelee touch (one creature grabbed by you); Strength +3 vs. Fortitude
Level 16Strength +5
Level 26Strength +8
HitYou throw the target, pushing it up to 3 squares. The target lands prone and takes 2d6 + Strength modifier damage.
Level 16Push up to 5 squares, and 3d6 + Strength modifier damage.
Level 26Push up to 7 squares, and 4d6 + Strength modifier damage.
The target takes half damage if it cannot be knocked prone. If the target negates the forced movement, it is not knocked prone and takes no damage.

item.title: Hedge Wizard's Gloves
item.fluff: With a wave of these patched gloves, you can perform magic tricks

block.name: Mage Hand
block.line: Level 14This power is an at-will power instead of encounter power.
EffectRanged 5; You conjure a spectral, floating hand in an unoccupied square within range. The hand lasts until the end of your next turn or until you use this power again.
Level 14Ranged 7.

If you conjure the hand into a square adjacent to yourself and are holding an object when you use this power, the hand can move the object into a pack, a pouch, a sheath, or a similar container and simultaneously move any one object carried or worn anywhere on your body into your hand.
While the hand persists, you can take the following actions:
Minor Action: The hand picks up or manipulates an object weighing 20 pounds or less. It can hold only one object at a time.
Level 1414 pounds or less.
Move Action: The hand moves up to 5 squares in any direction, carrying the object it holds.
Free Action: The hand drops the object it is holding.
Sustain MinorThe hand persists until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Prestidigitation
block.line: Level 14This power is an at-will power instead of encounter power.
EffectRanged 2; You accomplish one of the following effects in range:
Change the color of all items
Create a brief, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint music, or a strong odor.
Clean or soil all items in 1 cubic foot.
Instantly light (or snuff out) a candle, torch, or a small campfire.
Chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 pound of nonliving matter for up to 1 hour.
Make a small mark or symbol appear on a surface for up to 1 hour.
Level 14Up to 4 hours.
Produce out of nothingness a small item or image that exists until the end of your next turn.
Make a small, handheld item invisible until the end of your next turn.
SpecialNothing you create with this cantrip can deal damage, serve as a weapon or tool, or hinder another creature's actions. This cantrip cannot duplicate the effect of any other power.

item.title: Knifethrower's Gloves
item.fluff: Knives become even more deadly when your hands are wrapped in these fingerless, suede sheaths

block.name: Properties
block.line: These gloves have the following proterties:
You can draw a dagger as part of the same standard action used to attack with it.
When you use a dagger as a throw weapon, the dagger counts as a +1 magic weapon if it is not magical.
Level 11A +2 magic weapon.
Level 16A +3 magic weapon.
Level 21A +4 magic weapon.
Level 26A +5 magic weapon.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit with a Weapon attack using a dagger as a thrown weapon
EffectYou gain a +2 power bonus to the damage roll of the triggering attack.
Level 11 or 16+3 power bonus.
Level 21 or 26+4 power bonus.

item.title: Lancing Gloves
item.fluff: These supple brown leather riding gloves grip well and true

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 bonus to melee damage rolls while mounted.
Level 17+3 bonus.
Level 27+4 bonus.

item.title: Life-Draining Gauntlets
item.fluff: The dead flesh of these grisly gauntlets draws strength from your enemies
item.headline: Necrotic damage rolls

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with an attack and deal necrotic damage to it
EffectYou gain 10 temporary hit points.
Level 1615 temporary hit points.
Level 2620 temporary hit points.

item.title: Lion's Claw Gauntlets
item.fluff: These gauntlets, crafted from a lion's paws, help overcome tough foes when your luck takes a downturn

block.name: Property
block.line: When you make a Weapon attack that targets Fortitude and the natural roll is 8 or less, you gain a +1 item bonus to that attack roll
Level 15+2 item bonus.
Level 25+3 item bonus.
You DM might allow this to apply to non-Weapon attacks against Fortitude if they are considered physical.

item.title: Luckbender's Gloves
item.fluff: Luck favors the wearer of these gloves, each of which has a golden shamrock stitched on the back

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a damage roll for a melee attack
EffectReroll one damage die of your choice, using the second result even if it is lower.
Level 16Up to two damage dice of your choice.
Level 26Up to three damage dice of your choice.

item.title: Parry Gauntlets
item.fluff: With these thickly armored gauntlets, you are more secure when you take a breather

block.name: Property
block.line: When you take the total defense or second wind actions, you gain a +2 item bonus to all defenses until the beginning of your next turn.

item.title: Poisoner's Gloves
item.fluff: You can store a nasty surprise in these plain-looking gloves to envenom a weapon at a moment's notice

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou store one dose of a poison in these gloves. The poison must be one that can be applied to a weapon.
The gloves can hold only one dose of poison at a time.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementThe gloves must have a poison stored.
EffectMelee touch (one weapon you're holding); You apply the stored poison to the target weapon. This consumes the poison.

item.title: Reparation Apparatus
item.fluff: This gauntlet-like apparatus enhances your ability to repair constructs

block.name: Properties
block.line: This apparatus has the following properties:
When you use a power that allows a construct to spend a healing surge to regain hit points, that construct regains 2d6 additional hit points.
When you use an encounter power or a daily power that to grant a construct temporary hit points, that construct gains an additional 2d6 temporary hit points.

item.title: Resplendent Gloves
item.fluff: These fine calfskin glaves increase the potency of powers that break a foe's will

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to damage rolls with powers that target Will. This bonus is halved for multitarget attacks.
Level 15+4 item bonus.
Level 25+6 item bonus.
If the attack has the Illusion keyword, you can choose one target that you hit. The chosen creature grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

item.title: River of Life Gloves
item.fluff: These gloves bear turquoise and green patterns that show the coastline leading to the mouth of the River of Life

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou succesfully administer first aid to stability a dying creature
EffectThe triggering creature regains 5 hit points, and can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
Level 17Regains 10 hit points.
Level 27Regains 15 hit points.

item.title: Shadowfell Gloves
item.fluff: These supple black gloves, woven with Shadowfell thread, are highly prized by wizards and warlocks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou make an arcane attack

EffectUntil the end of the encounter, your arcane attacks deal +2 additional necrotic damage. If you have finished at least one encounter without expending your action point, this increases to +3 additional necrotic damage.
Level 16+4 additional necrotic damage or +5 additional necrotic damage, respectively.
Level 26+6 additional necrotic damage or +7 additional necrotic damage, respecitively.
Any untyped damage dealt by the triggering attack is necrotic damage instead, and the attack gains the Necrotic keyword.
If the triggering attack already has a damage type, the type is changed to necrotic and the corresponding keyword is replaced with Necrotic.
One target you hit with the triggering attack becomes weakened until the end of the currently acting creature's next turn.
Level 26Is weakened (save ends) or until the end of the currently acting creature's next turn, whichever lasts longer.

item.title: Stern Handler's Wraps
item.fluff: Beasts of all kinds shy away from the wearer of these plain-looking wraps, which glimmer with small, magical shards

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +3 item bonus to Intimidate checks and Nature checks against animals.
Level 14+6 item bonus.
Level 24+10 item bonus.

item.title: Twice-Clawed Gauntlets
item.fluff: The ritual which creates these hide gauntlets merges the claws of a second predator to the paws of a base creature

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to damage rolls while raging.
Level 14+4 item bonus.
Level 24+6 item bonus.
This bonus is halved for multitarget attacks.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: RequirementYou must be raging.
EffectUntil the end of the encounter or until you are no longer raging, you gain a +4 bonus to attack rolls with Rage powers.

item.title: Wrestler's Gloves
item.fluff: The palms of these rough hide wraps are coated with a tacky substance that holds fast to whatever you grasp

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Attack rolls with grab, defenses to prevent escaping from your grab, and saving throws to catch yourself when falling
